I’m an **urban planner** with a **landscape architecture** background, specializing in **digital mapping**, **spatial analysis**, and **urban analytics**. My research and teaching focus on **data-supported planning and design** for resilient and sustainable urban environments. I combine spatial data analysis, visualization, and multi-criteria decision-making to support strategic, cross-scalar planning.
